metadata.description: Letter to Major General Basilio Valdes from Post Office Inspector Benedicto Cunanan recommending the procurement of three mail trucks so that the reopening of the post-offices in Leyte will not be delayed
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Letter to Major General Basilio Valdes from Post Office Inspector Benedicto Cunanan recommending the procurement of three mail trucks
